name: Lumberjack Reloaded
overview: This is fan-made conversion of the C64 homebrew game Lumberjack. Visuals and music have been improved, gameplay is virtually the same. You are a Lumberjack who tries to chop down a tree as fast as he can without getting hit by branches from above. Sometimes women's clothing is stuck in the branches and collecting it will net you a nice bonus. I am not certain, but this might be inspiried by Monthy Python's skit "The Lumberjack Song".
